A PAINT AND SIP FUNDRAISER
Apple Hill Playhouse is hosting a paint and sip fundraiser on Saturday, July 23 in our beautiful orchard. One event is planned for adults and one for kids. Invite a friend and enjoy an evening of step-by-step instructions to create a one- of-a-kind creation with local visual artist, Micaela Cottman of DLG Tattoo while sipping on a beverage.
